text: Owenus is a genus of ichneumonid wasp, named for Denis Owen. ==Species== The genus has four species: * Owenus cingulatus (Kriechbaumer, 1894) * Owenus crocator (Tosquinet, 1896) * Owenus minor Townes, 1970 * Owenus variegatus (Morley, 1916) ==References== Category:Gelinae Category:Ichneumonidae genera
title: Owenus
